body:
Cool, I'll send this in a PR and add a test to catch this broadcasting issue in the future.

As @fmassa just pointed out to me, it might be better to raise an error if  `input.numel() !=  target.numel()` and then just do `target = target.view(input.size())`. This would avoid any broadcasting
